Lab→ Raecyclopedia

A catalog of everything I've looked up about beauty and fashion since January 1, 2021.

Beauty and fashion


What is menocore? AnswerA fashion style similar to normcore but specific to menopause-aged women, characterized by flowy linen, floppy hats, market totes, etc. Via Racked

How long should you wait to let skin care products absorb into your skin? AnswerIt's not necessary to wait between skin care steps, but you should wait before applying makeup to prevent pilling.

Should you exfoliate the skin around your eyes? AnswerYes, with a gentle eye treatment containing a chemical exfoliant such as retinol or glycolic acid. You can seal that with an eye cream as part of an evening skin care routine.

What is kinderwhore? AnswerThe 1990s fashion style popularized by Courtney Love and other punk and grunge musicians consisting of a mix of babydoll dresses and feminine apparel with distressed, punk sensibilities. Via Blog is the New Black

What are palazzo pants? AnswerPalazzo pants are very flared, wide-leg pants made of a lightweight fabric. Via Maria Speaks Prada
